main.name: Minhal Awais
main.shortDesc: I am a seasoned AI-enabled SaaS developer, driven by a passion for creating transformative software solutions that empower businesses to thrive in the digital era.

about.title: Visionary AI-Enabled SaaS Architect
about.about: As an accomplished AI-enabled SaaS developer, I have a proven track record of designing and delivering transformative software solutions that empower businesses to overcome their most pressing challenges. With a deep understanding of the evolving technological landscape and a keen eye for user-centric design, I possess the expertise to translate complex business requirements into intuitive, scalable, and data-driven SaaS products. My passion lies in integrating cutting-edge AI and machine learning capabilities into software ecosystems, amplifying their impact and unlocking new dimensions of efficiency and insight for my clients. As a Lead Software Engineer, I have spearheaded the development of groundbreaking SaaS platforms, including Pakistan's first AI-enabled Grievance Management System and an innovative Environmental Sustainability Reporting System for WWF Pakistan. I am driven by a relentless pursuit of innovation and a commitment to creating software that not only solves problems but also inspires and empowers the organizations and individuals who use it.

projects.name: Live Transcription and Translation Software
description: Developed real-time transcription and translation software to facilitate multilingual meetings.
Utilized advanced speech recognition to detect and transcribe conversations in multiple languages.
Provided live translations to enhance communication and collaboration across language barriers.
Proved invaluable for cross-cultural meetings, boosting productivity for the client.

projects.name: Dynamic Survey Module for Workforce Insights
description: Created a dynamic survey module enabling organizations to customize surveys.
Captured real-time employee feedback and sentiment using advanced NLP algorithms.
Delivered detailed workforce insights to drive targeted engagement and improvement efforts.
Supported decision-making with sentiment analysis and behavioral insights.

projects.name: Automated Report Generation Software
description: Developed custom software to automate report generation for TTI Testing Labs.
Streamlined the process to create high-quality, error-free reports in Word and PDF formats.
Integrated with client database to personalize each report to specific testing samples.
Significantly reduced time and manual effort required for report generation.

projects.name: Fruit of Sustainability Mobile Application
description: Developed a mobile app for employees to file grievances and check case status.
Streamlined access to Grievance Management System features in a mobile-friendly format.
Enabled investigation officers to manage and track case progress on the go.
Improved employee engagement and accessibility through a user-friendly interface.

projects.name: AI Enabled Grievance Management System
description: Developed Pakistan's first AI-enabled Grievance Management System.
Automated intake, investigation, and resolution processes with NLP and machine learning.
Provided real-time analytics to support data-driven decision-making.
Adopted by leading businesses, including Cheezious, Dawn, and Johny Jugnu.

projects.name: Environmental Sustainability Reporting System
description: Developed an Environmental Sustainability Reporting System for WWF Pakistan.
Integrated data from over 5,000 factories to track key sustainability metrics.
Provided visualizations and AI-powered analytics for sustainable decision-making.
Enabled monitoring of environmental impact aligned with SDGs (6, 7, 12, and 13).

desc: Focused on developing AI and Machine Learning expertise to solve real-world business problems through SaaS solutions.
Gained hands-on experience with AI and software development tools, including Python, React, and AWS, and applied them in multiple academic and professional projects.
Worked extensively on projects involving web application development, backend technologies, and cloud deployment.
Acquired knowledge in natural language processing, data analytics, and cloud computing, applying these to build industry-oriented solutions.
Familiar with software development methodologies, with a primary focus on Agile practices for iterative and efficient project management.

Spearheaded the development of Pakistan's first AI-enabled Grievance Management System, a groundbreaking SaaS platform that has been adopted by leading brands and factories, transforming the way employee complaints are managed and resolved.

Architected and delivered an innovative Environmental Sustainability Reporting System for WWF Pakistan, integrating data from over 5,000 factories to provide advanced analytics and visualization, empowering organizations to make data-driven decisions that drive sustainable practices.

Demonstrated expertise in full-stack development, AI/ML integration, and product management, leveraging cutting-edge technologies such as React, Node.js, MongoDB, and PostgreSQL to create transformative SaaS solutions.

Developed a custom Automatic Report Generation software for TTI Testing Labs, revolutionizing their report creation process by automating the generation of personalized Word and PDF reports, streamlining operations and enhancing efficiency.

Created a pioneering Live Transcription and Translation software, empowering global teams to overcome language barriers and collaborate seamlessly during meetings and conversations through advanced speech recognition and language translation technologies.
Showcased versatility in problem-solving, with a strong focus on delivering custom software solutions that address unique client challenges and unlock new avenues for growth.
